articles.title: Pulisic, US close to World Cup qualification thanks to his fiery Captain America performance - ESPN
articles.description: In a game where the U.S. needed its stars to shine, Pulisic delivered exactly what Berhalter demanded. Now, they're 90 minutes from the World Cup.
articles.content: ORLANDO, Fla. -- Tyler Adams has been the de facto captain for the U.S. men's national team during this World Cup qualifying cycle, but when the U.S. players emerged from the tunnel on Sunday, Christ… [+7351 chars]

articles.title: Within 24 Hours, Two Fireballs Were Seen In The United States And Canada - newstree
